folder: Richmond Terrace & Schuyler Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Richmond Terrace, at the S.W. corner of Schuyler Street, showing the Richmond County Court House, the view being across the Baltimore & Ohio freight yards as seen from the ferry viaduct. On the left is a portion of the Borough Hall.
April 29, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same,a year later.
April, 1930
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The Court House, seen from the little park on the south
side of the ferry terminal ramp.
December 26, 1935
P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Schuyler Street

title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Schuyler Street

folder: Richmond Terrace & Schuyler Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Terrace, north from Schuyler Street (left) to Hamilton Avenue, seen across the Baltimore and Ohio Railroad yards from the ferry terminal viaduct. The 4-story building on the left is a hotel, occupying the site of the old Hugots Hotel; tho building on the right is the Richmond Borough Police Headquarters. In the background is the tower of Curtis High School.
April 29, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, a year later.
April, 1930
P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Schuyler Street
